    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com funcionen els forns microones?</string>
            <string language="en">How do microwave ovens work?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie arbeiten Mikrowellenherde?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les fours à micro-ondes fonctionnent-ils
?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os fornos de microonda trabalham?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i forni a microonde funzionano?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι φούρνοι μικροκυμάτων λειτουργούν;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre què són i com funcionen els forns microones i les normes que cal seguir per utilitzar-los. Inclou enllaços per aprofundir en el tema.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on what microwave ovens are, how they work, and how they are to be used. It includes links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tractament dels aliments</string>
            <string language="en">food processing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia</string>
            <string language="en">technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, was 
Mikrowellenherde sind, wie sie arbeiten und wie sie verwendet werden 
sollen. Es schließt Links für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur ce que sont les fours 
à micro-ondes, la façon dont ils fonctionnent, et comment ils 
doivent être utilisés. Il inclut des liens pour de plus amples
informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em o que os fornos de microonda
são, em como trabalham, e como devem ser usados. Inclui as 
ligações para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su che cosa i forni a microonde
sono, su come funzionano e come devono essere usati. Include i 
collegamenti per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) σε ποιους φούρνους 
μικροκυμάτων είναι, πώς λειτουργούν, και πώς πρόκειται να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν. Περιλαμβάνει τις συνδέσεις για περισσότερες
πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelverarbeitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transformation des produits alimentaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processar de alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasformazione dei prodotti alimentari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
